document.forum_title: Local Obituaries from KMOV.com and Tributes.com
document.topic_text: Next SEARCH OTHER SOURCES Funeral services will be held at 11am on Wednesday August 24 2016 at Murdale Baptist Church in Carbondale; Pastor Paul Hicks of the Murdale Baptist Church will officiate. Burial will follow at Pleasant Grove Memorial Park near Murphysboro. Visitation will be from 5 until 9pm on Tuesday August 23 2016 at Crawshaw Funeral Home in Murphysboro and from 9am until the hour of services on Wednesday at the church. Create An Online Memorial For Joan M. Kennedy The beautiful and interactive Eternal Tribute tells Joan's life story the way it deserves to be told in words , pictures and video . Create an online memorial to tell that story for generations to come, creating a permanent place for family and friends to honor the memory of your loved one. Select An Online Memorial Product:
